decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the height of the outbuilding would not exceed 4 metres or that the eaves would not exceed 2.5 metres. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with paragraph E1.(e)(i) & (f) of Class E of Part 1,  Schedule 2 of theTown and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the swimming pool would not exceed 4 metres in the case of a building with a dual-pitched roof,  2.5 metres in the case of a swimming pool within 2 metres of the boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse, or 3 metres in any other case. It has not been demonstrated, on the balance of probability, that the eaves would not exceed 2.5 metres. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with paragraph E1.(e) & (f) of Class E of Part 1,  Schedule 2 of theTown and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Formation of swimming pool and single-storey detached outbuilding (to be used as gym) at rear of property
